channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The $11 Billion Marketplace Enabling the Crypto Scam Economy

item.title: As Microsoft leaves its observer seat, OpenAI says it won’t have any more observers
item.description: Months after Microsoft gained an observer seat on OpenAI’s board, the company is leaving the position of the non-voting seat. In a letter sent to Open...

item.title: The 29 Best Movies on Max (aka HBO Max) Right Now (July 2024)
item.description: Quad Gods, Dune: Part Two, and Chinatown are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Max this month.

item.title: Nike Is Killing the App for Its $350 Self-Tying Sneakers
item.description: After August 6, you won’t be able to download the app that controls the Adapt BB, and it won’t be getting any more updates.

item.title: Iceland is dodging the VC doldrums as Frumtak Ventures lands $87 million for its fourth fund

item.title: 7 Lesser-Known Google Maps Features
item.description: Even if you use Google Maps every day on your phone or on your computer, you might not know about these hidden tricks.

item.title: Anthropic’s Claude adds a prompt playground to quickly improve your AI apps
